Translations.Text: Iba response z jeho ludia bol ich saying Banish Lot's rodina tvoj town; they je zaludnit kto zelat je pure
Consequently my saved him jeho rodina except jeho manzelka; my pocitat ju among the doomed
My lejak them certain lejak. bol chudobny lejak ludia warned
Say Chvalit bol GOD peace bol Jeho servants koho He zvolit si! GOD lepsi idols some zaludnit je set

Kto Jeden je created heavens zem? Kto je 1 kto sends nadol ona sky zavlazit whereby my produce zahrada full z beauty! -Ona possibly nie zhotovit its strom? bol it iny god GOD Indeed they je zaludnit kto deviated
Kto Jeden robit zem habitable zapricinit rieka run it miesto it mountains je created barrier 2 zavlazit? bol it iny god GOD Indeed vela z them nie zauzlit
Kto Jeden zachranit those je become zufaly vola sa Him relieves adversity robit ona inheritors zem? bol it iny god GOD Zriedka robit ona berie heed
Kto Jeden je guides ona darkness zem a sea Kto Jeden je sends zranit dobry zvest signaling Jeho zlutovanie? bol it iny god GOD exalted je GOD having any partner
Kto Jeden zasvatit creation je potom repeats it Kto Jeden je zadovazit for ona heaven zem? bol it iny god GOD Say Show mna tvoj proof if ona bol truthful
Say Ziaden 1 heavens zem zauzlit buduci except GOD They robit nie vecer zbadat ako when they resurrected
Skutocne ich znalost Hereafter zmateny. Skutocne they harbor doubts it Skutocne they bol totally heedless thereof
Those disbelieved said my turn into dust i our rodicia my get brought out
My dat same promise v the minuly. These je nothing tales z minuly
Say Roam zem note consequences guilty
Nie rmutit sa them nie annoyed ich kut plany
They say When promise pojdem ist okolo ona bol truthful
Say Ona already suffering some z retribution ona challenge
Tvoj Lord bol full z grace ludia vela z them bol unappreciative
Tvoj Lord fully zauzlit co ich chests zatajit co they declare
There bol nothing heavens zem zatajit God everything bol profound rekord
This Quran zaplatit vela issues Dieta Izrael; issues lenze they still disputing
vela assuredly it bol guide zlutovanie believers
Tvoj Lord bol Jeden kto judges them v accordance s Jeho rules He bol Almighty Omniscient
Therefore put tvoj trust GOD ona nasledovat manifest truth
Ona nie robit dead nor deaf hear vola sa they turn
Nor mozem ona guide blind ich straying Iba jeden hear ona bol those verit v our revelations decide bol submitters
